text: Fleroya ledermannii is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found in Angola, Benin, Cameroon, the Republic of the Congo, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ivory Coast, Equatorial Guinea, Gabon, Ghana, Liberia, and Nigeria. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Naucleeae Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Fleroya ledermannii
